trans-unit.source: Provides a way to create a custom rule in order to check the validity of user input.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來建立自訂規則以檢查使用者輸入的有效性。

trans-unit.source: When you use the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model, you can associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with your binding object.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型，您可以將<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>與繫結物件。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create custom rules, make a subclass of this class and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立自訂規則，讓子類別的類別，並實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, use the built-in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>, which catches exceptions that are thrown during source updates, or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>, which checks for errors raised by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> implementation of the source object.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 使用內建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>，這會攔截在來源更新期間擲回的例外狀況或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>，引發的錯誤的檢查<xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>來源物件的實作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: The binding engine checks each ValidationRule that is associated with a binding every time it transfers an input value, which is the binding target property value, to the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結引擎會檢查每一次，它會傳送輸入的值，也就是繫結目標屬性值，繫結來源屬性的繫結相關聯之每個驗證規則。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 關於資料驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to validate user-provided data in a dialog box, see [Dialog Boxes Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如何驗證在對話方塊中的使用者提供資料的相關資訊，請參閱[對話方塊概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> class with the specified validation step and a value that indicates whether the validation rule runs when the target is updated.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref>具有指定的驗證步驟和值，指出是否要在目標更新時執行驗證規則類別。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies when the validation rule runs.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定執行驗證規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the validation rule run when the target of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> is updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>將驗證規則時執行的目標<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>更新，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會執行驗證檢查的值。

trans-unit.source: You must implement this method when you create a subclass of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class in order to create a custom validation rule.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的子類別時，您必須實作這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>類別若要建立自訂驗證規則。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: Each time the data binding engine transfers a value from the binding target property (from user input) to the binding source property (the underlying data), it checks whether any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> are defined for that binding.
trans-unit.target: 每次資料繫結引擎會將值從繫結目標屬性 （從使用者輸入） 繫結來源屬性 （基礎資料），它會檢查是否有任何<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>定義該繫結。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> are defined for the binding, the engine calls the Validate method on each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> until one of them finds an error or until all of them pass.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>所定義的繫結，則引擎會呼叫 Validate 方法的每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>直到其中一個發現錯誤，或直到通過時讓它們全部</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule></xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 關於資料驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value from the binding target to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查之繫結目標值。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: 要用於此規則的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: 會執行驗證檢查的值。

trans-unit.source: The value from the binding target to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查之繫結目標值。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: 要用於此規則的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The binding expression that uses the validation rule.
trans-unit.target: 使用驗證規則的繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: 會執行驗證檢查的值。

trans-unit.source: The value from the binding target to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查之繫結目標值。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: 要用於此規則的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The binding group that uses the validation rule.
trans-unit.target: 使用驗證規則繫結群組。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation rule runs when the target of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> is updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否執行驗證規則時的目標<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>會更新。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation rule runs when the target of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> is updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行時的驗證規則的目標<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>更新，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the validation rule runs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證規則執行時。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>。
